column2: an A.M. Eatery////This place was AWESOME!!!! They had so many menu selections and it was hard to choose. From the French toast
column3: to the bacon and sausage. They must use organic eggs as two eggs did not yield as much on my plate (I wish I had more!!!!) and was a little sad. Overall..... I WILL DEFINITELY return and can't wait to get home to see how the ATL location tastes!!!!!
